alert.note: Alert for Green (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 01 at 1:25AM EDT until April 01 at 1:45AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN GREEN COUNTY... At 1225 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 7 miles northwest of Greensburg, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This dangerous storm will be near... Greensburg around 1230 AM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
